data.Name: Slash: The River Is Rising Tour
data.Description: Slash featuring Myles Kennedy & The Conspirators are on tour performing all of their hits along with songs from their brand new album 4 (out February 11th).

data.Name: Slash
data.Bio: Saul Hudson (born 23 July 1965, Stoke-on-Trent, England), better known by his stage name Slash, is a British-American musician. He is the lead guitarist of the American hard rock band Guns N' Roses, with whom he performed and recorded between 1985 and 1996, and rejoined in 2016. He later formed Slash's Snakepit and co-founded Velvet Revolver with his former bandmates Duff McKagan and Matt Sorum. His debut solo album, Slash , was released in April 2010. Read more on Last.fm
